story: You find yourself standing in front of a large, ominous-looking incinerator in the heart of The Recycling Facility. The air is thick with toxic fumes and the smell of burning plastic. Suddenly, you hear the sound of machinery whirring to life behind the incinerator's doors. What do you do?

actions.action: Investigate the source of the noise
actions.good: You cautiously approach the incinerator and find a hidden compartment containing valuable items. Your curiosity pays off, and you discover a stash of useful equipment.
actions.bad: As you investigate, the machinery behind the incinerator's doors begins to malfunction, causing it to overheat and spew forth toxic smoke. You take damage from inhaling the fumes, but the loot remains hidden.

actions.good: With your skills, you manage to sabotage the incinerator's controls, shutting it down and preventing a catastrophic explosion. In doing so, you find a hidden compartment containing valuable items.
actions.bad: Your attempt to disable the incinerator triggers an emergency shutdown protocol, causing the facility's security systems to go into lockdown. You take damage from the resulting chaos, but the loot remains out of reach.

actions.action: Escape the area and find a safer route
actions.good: You quickly make your way out of The Recycling Facility, finding a hidden passage that leads you back to a more secure part of the gang stronghold. You discover a stash of useful items along the way.
actions.bad: As you try to escape, you get caught in a security trap set by the facility's AI. You take damage from the trap, but manage to break free and continue on your way.
